reviewText: One of my favorite animes!! Great price too considering it was $40 at Best Buy

Death Note (set # one) is a dark dark look into the minds of Japanese anime creators. This is a story about an evil notebook that kills it's victims when their names are entered into the notebook. I really did enjoy the dark sadistic twisted humor, and I know you will too. This video is rated R.

What would you do with the power of a Shinigami( a god of death).  Light Yagami a brilliant high school student gains this power.  Death Note is an excellent anime drama, and it's sure to keep you on the edge of your seat the entire way through the series.  It's one of my favorites and it will not disappoint.

Contains episodes 1-20.

Special Features: Japanese Creators Interview, Behind the Scenes with the English Voice Cast, Audio Commentary.

Spoken Languages: English, Japanese, English subtitles.

Publisher - VIZ
Media - DVD
Format - Hybrid
Age Rating - 15+ (More Information)
500 Minutes
Date Available - November 04 2014
